message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in this product though, and I'm willing to pay $14000.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $18000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $16500. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. Let me know what you think.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $16500 is still a little high for me. I'm sticking with my original offer of $14000. This is my final offer, and I'm really hoping we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I understand that you're sticking to your original offer, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession and counteroffer at $16000. This is a very good price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. Let me know what you think.
